title: 01-texor
text: proposed package can help converting old LaTeX based documents, research papers HTML intermediate conversions. particularly problem R Research papers HTML export available hence modern compatibility export HTML file missed . bring documents online HTML based webpages much better alternative opposed PDFs solve lack web versions texor provide mechanism.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Abhishek Ulayil. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Ulayil (2022). texor: tools converting LaTeX source files RJ-web-articles. R package version 0.6.7.
code: @Manual{,   title = {texor: tools for converting LaTeX source files into RJ-web-articles},   author = {Abhishek Ulayil},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.6.7}, }

what: tools for converting LaTeX source files into RJ-web-articles
title: tools for converting LaTeX source files into RJ-web-articles
text: texor package deals multiple challenges occour conversion LaTeX source files (typically generate PDF) web friendly RJ-web-article format.

what: Currently texor can handle R-Journal structured LaTeX files with support for:
title: tools for converting LaTeX source files into RJ-web-articles
text: RJournal based LaTeX files macros \pkg{},\CRANpkg{},\BIOpkg{}, \code{}, \acronym{} Reading Metadata LaTeX file well DESCRIPTION. Reading bibliography bibtex files ignoring \thebibliography Supports code environments like Sinput,Soutput, example ,example*,verbatim, smallverbatim code highlight. Supports graphics included PDF,PNG,JPG. Functions convert PDF graphics PNG. Almost tables supported exceptions. things like citations,links,footnotes,math,ctv,package references also supported. parser read minimally convert inbuilt \thebibliography bibtex (moved rebib) Figure/Table/Equation numbering Stream Editor rename alien commands/environments accepted defaults. Pre Post conversion statistics environments verification. Bibliography aggregation.(moved rebib)

title: tools for converting LaTeX source files into RJ-web-articles
text: Tikz graphics compilation support functions Better Documentation vignettes, man pages, articles, pkgdown Logging Events Log Files Passing R-CMD-check

title: tools for converting LaTeX source files into RJ-web-articles
text: install dependency packages (github development versions) install development version GitHub :
code: # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("rstudio/distill") remotes::install_github("Abhi-1U/rjtools") remotes::install_github("Abhi-1U/rebib") # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("Abhi-1U/texor") # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("Abhi-1U/texor") # also install rebib for bibliography remotes::install_github("Abhi-1U/rebib")

title: tools for converting LaTeX source files into RJ-web-articles
text: quick example use texor package sample RJournal article (included package inst/article)
code: # similarly any file path wd <-  system.file("examples/article", package = "texor") # first include the style file texor::include_style_file(wd) # handle bibliography rebib::aggregate_bibliography(wd) # texor::handle_bibliography(wd) # will also work # patch table env using stream editor texor::patch_table_env(wd) # patch code env using stream editor texor::patch_code_env(wd) # check for tikz if TRUE call tikz related functions(still under work) texor::article_has_tikz(wd) # copy files to a /web folder texor::copy_other_files(wd) # generate environment stats for tex file texor::pre_conversion_statistics(wd) # convert to markdown texor::convert_to_markdown(wd) # the below function wont work on any article as it needs a folder structure # similar to RJournal style /YYYY-ZZ/YYYY-MMM where YYYY is the year,  # ZZ is the Journal issue number and MMM is the DOI referral(unique article number) texor::generate_rmd(wd) texor::produce_html(wd)

title: convert one single pdf file to png — convert_to_png
code: article_dir <- system.file("examples/pdf_conversion",                  package = "texor") texor::convert_to_png(paste0(article_dir,"/normal.pdf")) #> Warning: 2 arguments not used by format '/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/texor/examples/pdf_conversion/normal.png' #> Converting page 1 to /Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/texor/examples/pdf_conversion/normal.png... done! #> [1] "/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/texor/examples/pdf_conversion/normal.png"

title: count latex environments — count_env
code: article_dir <- system.file("examples/article",                  package = "texor") figures <- texor::count_env(article_dir, "figure") print(paste("figure count : ", figures)) #> [1] "figure count :  1"

title: count inline elements — count_inline
text: counts inline elements embedded within latex file currently supported inlines : math (based $$), code (based \code) Citations (based \cite,\citealp, \citep, \citet)

title: count inline elements — count_inline
text: article_dir path directory contains RJ article inline name inline element

title: count inline elements — count_inline
text: count inline element

title: count inline elements — count_inline
code:
article_dir <- system.file("examples/article",                  package = "texor") math <- texor::count_inline(article_dir, "math") code <- texor::count_inline(article_dir, "inlinecode") cite <- texor::count_inline(article_dir, "cite") print(paste("math inlines : ", math, "
",             "code inlines : ", code, "
",             "citations    : ", cite)) #> [1] "math inlines :  0 
 code inlines :  0 
 citations    :  2"

title: Version 0.6.7
text: Equation labeling numbering Code/table/equation/figure pre-processors fixed many meta data related issues now use Mathjax V3 New testthat test cases pkgdown website texor::latex_to_web() single article new stat tools metrics conversion coverage check environment/word count pandoc convert

title: Version 0.6.7
text: Support absolute paths Fixed lot logic errors Fixed incompatibilities removed unnecessary code features R-CMD-check passing Github workflows work now Improved stat filter exports pre post conversion stats yaml file namespaces logger URL fix non http:// web Links Figure max width : 100% extra option added figures. fixed pre processing tikz fixed problems journal volume comment filter mechanism latex improved lua filter numbering centering figures fixed slug issue

title: Version 0.5.9
text: Automated orchestration conversion New stream editor R Using stream editor instead lua filter code Using stream editor instead GNU sed table changes lua filter R code Using stream editor figure environment patching Automatic fetching volume issue folder

title: Version 0.5.9
text: Support absolute paths fixed(almost functions) Fixed logic errors Fixes metafix.sty

title: Version 0.5.5
text: Placeholder abstract text articles missing abstract \CRANpkg(),\BIOpkg() CRAN_TASK_VIEWS supported Tables numbering new lua filter numbering tables Patched Metafix.sty vignettes

title: Version 0.5.2
text: package matures point almost features working, soon ready CRAN deployment. following features working: LaTeX macros \pkg,\CRANpkg,\code supported. Reading Metadata LaTeX file well DESCRIPTION. Reading bibliography bibtex files ignoring \thebibliography parser read convert inbuilt \thebibliography bibtex Supports code environments like Sinput,Soutput, example ,example*,verbatim code highlight. Supports graphics included PDF,PNG,JPG. Functions convert PDF graphics PNG. Almost tables converted exceptions. things like citations,links,footnotes,math(limited) also supported.
